analysis: The project is a well-structured web application using Vite, TypeScript, and React with a comprehensive UI component library. It includes a server setup, client-side code, and shared utilities. The project has been optimized with improvements such as ESLint, Prettier, Husky for pre-commit hooks, Vite configuration for better performance, lazy loading for routes and components, and error boundaries for enhanced user experience.

improvements.description: Enhance the ErrorBoundary component to provide more detailed error information and user-friendly error messages.
Add more customization options for the Toaster component, such as different toast types and auto-dismiss functionality.
Implement a dark mode toggle feature with smooth transitions and persistence across sessions.
